thread.title: Hotel and Resort News: Packages in Rome, Paris and London
thread.title_full: Hotel and Resort News: Packages in Rome, Paris and London - The New York Times

author: Shivani Vora
title: Hotel and Resort News: Packages in Rome, Paris and London
text:
SEASONAL OFFERS AT HOTELS IN LONDON, ROME AND PARIS
With lower prices and fewer crowds, fall is an ideal time to visit Europe’s big cities. Below are three packages for the season from hotels in London, Rome and Paris.
The London Edition hotel in London has a package for the Frieze Art Fair , held this year from Oct. 14 to 17. The property is a 10-minute walk from Regent’s Park where the event takes place, and guests get accommodations, English breakfast for two, a pair of tickets to either the Frieze Art Fair or the Frieze Masters, which offers a contemporary lens on historical art, and a copy of Frieze Magazine. Rates from £395 (about $580) a night.
In Transit Travel news, deals and tips, written by the editors and reporters of the Travel section.
